phases.title: UI Mapping Command
tasks: Implement copilot-automator.mapUITextArea command to allow users to select and map input/output areas.
Store mappings (URI, type, description) in globalState for persistence.
Prompt user for classification and optional description.

phases.title: Automation Integration
tasks: Update automation logic to use mapped input/output areas for sending prompts and reading responses.
Modify getLastCopilotChatResponse and sendPromptToChat to leverage mappings.
Log mapping and automation actions for traceability.

phases.title: UI/UX Enhancements
tasks: Add a webview button and history tree item to trigger the mapping command.
Provide user feedback and error handling for mapping actions.
Validate mapped areas and warn if inaccessible or stale.

phases.title: Mapping Management & Settings
tasks: Implement a settings or management panel to view, edit, or remove mappings.
Allow users to update or remap areas as needed.
Support exporting/importing mappings for workflow reproducibility.

phases.title: Advanced Automation & Fallbacks
tasks: Integrate mappings with instruction files for automated workflows.
Add fallback logic if mapped areas are unavailable.
Explore auto-detection of likely input/output areas based on URI patterns.

notes: Each phase can be developed and tested independently.
User feedback should be gathered after each phase for iterative improvement.
Documentation and usage examples should be updated as features are added.
